name: Crypt of Necrotower
description:
Crypt of the necrotower is a mix of game genre between card game and tower defense !

Use Space to hit enemies and repair your turret. Use ZSQD to move around. 

Drag and drop your turrets to reach the end of our levels ! 

Incredible project made by @Resnox and @Alexandre2Bi in 48H for Mix And Game Jam
